task.summary: put reconnection when change the server ip.
resolve problems when change the background of the Reconnect button and add a new mechanism to throw alertbox from the thread.
change the internal name of the Reconnect button to Recon_Button and change the name of the onClick function related with this button.
add connection code with the alarm controler in a button called Refresh.
Resolve the problem of crash when press the "Refresh" button without connection. Also add a circle progress bar when try to connect to the alarm server.
Resolve the problem that the app hangs up when close it.
Use Color library instead of the color in hex.
Minor changes and add new clases TX_Messages and RX_Messages
Create messages from the app to the alarm. Msg_2 is not created correctly.
Create Msg2 correctly when pulse Reset button or change Sensor Powered switch.
Add two async tasks to send msg2 alone or msg1 plus msg2

MESSAGE.value: put reconnection when change the server ip.
resolve problems when change the background of the Reconnect button and add a new mechanism to throw alertbox from the thread.
change the internal name of the Reconnect button to Recon_Button and change the name of the onClick function related with this button.
add connection code with the alarm controler in a button called Refresh.
Resolve the problem of crash when press the "Refresh" button without connection. Also add a circle progress bar when try to connect to the alarm server.
Resolve the problem that the app hangs up when close it.
Use Color library instead of the color in hex.
Minor changes and add new clases TX_Messages and RX_Messages
Create messages from the app to the alarm. Msg_2 is not created correctly.
Create Msg2 correctly when pulse Reset button or change Sensor Powered switch.
Add two async tasks to send msg2 alone or msg1 plus msg2
